preqs: One of FIT1031, FIT1005, FIT1047 or GCO3812 or equivalent

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with course version in {1794, 2146, 3301, 3803} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT1005, FIT1031, FIT1047, GCO3812} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit will introduce students to advances in the distributed networked environment. The unit provides knowledge of internetworking protocols, QoS for critical applications, network management and TCP/IP operation. Access to the university's computer systems through an internet service provider is compulsory for distance education students.
